snippet: From the sharp recriminations of the already fierce Presidential election campaign to the fires of America's culture wars, the murderous anger in Benghazi is stoking America's internal battles.
abstract: From the sharp recriminations of the already fierce Presidential election campaign to the fires of America's culture wars, the murderous anger in Benghazi is stoking America's internal battles.

headline.main: Ambassador's Murder in Libya Ignites American Civil Wars
